point1: Rachit Doshi has been a Cloud Computing Intern at WEBXELA, where he built a solid foundation in cloud service models, cloud deployment types, and IAM standards, from June to September 2024.
point2: With his innovative project FINDR (Food Industry Network for Digital Recommendations), Rachit generated accurate recommendations using TF-IDF vectorization and cosine similarity on collected data.
point3: Rachit boasts a strong technical skillset, proficient in programming languages such as Java, Python, and JavaScript, and having hands-on experience with frameworks like React.js, Node.js, and Flask.
point4: As a skilled cloud professional, Rachit has demonstrated expertise in Azure, AWS, and GCP cloud platforms, with experience in analyzing cloud pricing structures and services offered.
point5: Rachit's unique strength lies in his ability to leverage his technical expertise and industry knowledge to drive innovative solutions, making him a valuable asset to any organization.
